title: Application error 0Xc000005
body: when i launch league i get a application error 0Xc000005 i know it says to run as admin or uninstall or fix files ive tried it all it wont work. not sure what to do from here was wondering if anyone else has tried the solutions and still getting the same message i do.  hoping someone knows or a riot employee will see (: all the help i can get is appreciated.  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: i get the same issue! riot help!!!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

For a bit of context, the error 0Xc000005 signals a memory access violation. There's a number of things that can cause this (hardware issues such as faulty RAM, driver corruptions, corrupted game files, etc.), but recently we've been seeing this more often that not from players using AVG Antivirus.

I'd try temporarily uninstalling AVG as a troubleshooting step to see if it stops.  I'd also double check that your [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104) are set up correctly.  Lemme know if this works for you!
ive been having this same issue for a few days now and ive tried disabling avg and it didnt do anything to help{{item:3070}} we need your help o wise ones
